name: Ultra Raptor II Mid Gtx Hiking Boot - Men's

features: Hf tpu lacing harness in conjunction with the webbing integrated into the tongue provides an adjustable fit
Gore-tex protection is waterproof and breathable keeping your feet dry no matter the weather
Frixion XT 2.0 outsole with impact brake system provides excellent traction and stability on steep descents, slick trails and uneven ground
Tpu transkinetic evo heel stabilizer and the high collar provide extra support and stability backpackers need for high mileage days
Injection molded memlex midsole provides cushion and support and a noticeable bounce for every stride
Upper: High-weave air mesh / microfiber mudguard / HF TPU lacing harness / TPU Transkinetic EVO heel stabilizer / comfort collar w/ pull-tab
Lining: Gore-Tex® extended comfort w/ Gore-Flex® / slip resistant nylon mesh
Midsole: Injection molded memlex / Nylon® molded flex TPU transfer shank
Sole: Frixion® XF 2.0/ Impact Brake System™ X-Axis™ / Trail Bite Heel
Drop: Drop: 12mm - Stack: Heel: 27mm / Toe: 15mm / 4.5mm Lugs
Last-fit: Tempo 2 / Tempo 2 Wide - Medium / Wide.
